named-query.name: Role.getCommentairesFromUtilisateurs
named-query.query: select c from Commentaire c where c.utilisateur.id= :idUser

named-query.name: Role.getCommentairesFromArticle
named-query.query: select c from Commentaire c where c.article.id= :idArticle

named-query.name: Role.getArticlesFromUtilisateurs
named-query.query: select a from Article a where a.utilisateur.id= :idUser
